Articles.Content:
A recent study on the health benefits of Kerb-ridium has come up with good results. "Prolong exposure to Kerbridium has some interesting effects, Such as reduced aging, Stimulating Cellular Repair and Muscle growth." - Landous Kerman.

One problem, Kerbridium (Kh4Ag2C) is not easy to come by, Although from our surface sample database. We know of one place that is full of the stuff. Pol is literally 75% Kerbridium. The media knows also and has leaked it out to the General Public, We are being sent at least 50 Letters a Day Asking for a Ferry to Pol.

Aside from the horrid backstory,

Scoring:

Money per ticket= Cost not recovered

Example,

Lets say I had a Crew Ferry that could go to Pol Refuel there and Come back.

Capacity=4 Kermen

1000 Unit of LF+O=3000

3000/4=750$ Per Ticket.

If the Ferry was non reusable it would include the cost of any unsalvageable parts.

Rules,

-Infrastructure must be delivered via Launcher(No HyperEDITING!)

-Refuel missions to the station will be deducted from your total score,(How many times you can use your station before refueling it)[Once I find a way to score it]

-Winner is the person with the lowest P/Ticket Cost

-Modded Entries will go under a different leaderboard

-Non of that Alt+F12 rubbish.

-Information Only Mods will be ranked under Stock Leaderboard.

-All SSTO planes used to deliver stuff must Land after it drops it's payload(Unless it's meant to stay up there for some reason), Just don't leave 10 SSTO's doing nothing just floating around.

-Must be done in Career( You can edit the Science Points and Cash to unlock everything)

-Must be done in Easy Difficulty

-No using Recovery Transponder Fittings (Administration Building)

-Videos or Screenshots are acceptable.

-Due to health and safety regulations, Nuclear Engines must not be fired in the Atmosphere.

-All Passengers must be in pressurized seats.
